topic: Basic Greetings: Hello, Goodbye, Thank You
detailedSummary: Essential Spanish greetings: 'Hola' (Hello), 'Buenos días' (Good morning), 'Buenas tardes' (Good afternoon), 'Buenas noches' (Good evening/night), 'Adiós' (Goodbye), 'Hasta luego' (See you later), 'Gracias' (Thank you), 'De nada' (You're welcome), 'Por favor' (Please).
whyItMatters: Mastering Basic Greetings: Hello, Goodbye, Thank You is essential for building a strong foundation in spanish - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
